description_task: Selects all elements of type A. Type refers to the type of tag, so <div>,<p> and <ul> are all different element types.
Selects all elements of type A. Type refers to the type of tag, so <div>,<p> and <ul> are all different element types.
Selects all element with a specific id. You can also combine the ID selector with the type selector.

task: Select an element inside another element
description_task: Selects all B inside of A. B is called a descendant because it is inside of another element.
example_first: <mark>p strong</mark> selects all <mark><strong></mark> elements that are inside of any <mark><p></mark>.
example_second: <mark>#fancy span</mark> selects any span elements that are inside of the element with <mark>id="fancy"</mark>
